verses.verse: O Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of my salvation <WH3444>, I have cried <WH6817> day <WH3117> and night before you <WH3915>:
Let my prayer <WH8605> come <WH935> before <WH6440> you <WH5186>: incline your ear <WH241> unto my cry <WH7440>;
For my soul <WH5315> is full <WH7646> of troubles <WH7451>: and my life <WH2416> draws near <WH5060> unto the grave <WH7585>.
I am counted <WH2803> with them that go down <WH3381> into the pit <WH953>: I am as a man <WH1397> that has no strength <WH353>:
Free <WH2670> among the dead <WH4191>, like the slain <WH2491> that lie <WH7901> in the grave <WH6913>, whom you you remember <WH2142> no more <WH1504>: and they are cut off from your hand <WH3027>.
You have laid <WH7896> me in the lowest <WH8482> pit <WH953>, in darkness <WH4285>, in the deeps <WH4688>.
Your wrath <WH2534> lies hard <WH5564> upon me <WH6031>, and you have afflicted me with all your waves <WH4867>. Selah <WH5542>.
You have put away <WH7368> my acquaintance <WH3045> far <WH7368> from me <WH7896>; you have made me a abomination <WH8441> unto them <WH3607>: I am shut up, and I cannot come forth <WH3318>.
My eye <WH5869> mourns <WH1669> by reason of affliction <WH6040>: Lord <WH3068>, I have called <WH7121> daily <WH3117> upon you <WH7849>, I have stretched out my hands unto you <WH3709>.
Will you show <WH6213> wonders <WH6382> to the dead <WH4191>? shall the dead <WH7496> arise <WH6965> and praise <WH3034> you <WH5542>? Selah.
Shall your lovingkindness <WH2617> be declared <WH5608> in the grave <WH6913>? or your faithfulness <WH530> in destruction <WH11>?
Shall your wonders <WH6382> be known <WH3045> in the dark <WH2822>? and your righteousness <WH6666> in the land <WH776> of forgetfulness <WH5388>?
But unto you have I cried <WH7768>, O Lord <WH3068>; and in the morning <WH1242> shall my prayer <WH8605> meet you <WH6923>.
Lord <WH3068>, why cast you off <WH2186> my soul <WH5315>? why hide <WH5641> you your face from me <WH6440>?
I am afflicted <WH6041> and ready to die <WH1478> from my youth <WH5290> up <WH5375>: while I suffer your terrors <WH367> I am distracted <WH6323>.
Your fierce wrath <WH2740> goes over <WH5674> me <WH1161>; your terrors have cut me off <WH6789>.
They came round about <WH5437> me daily <WH3117> like water <WH4325>; they surrounded <WH5362> me about together <WH3162>.
Lover <WH157> and friend <WH7453> have you put far <WH7368> from me <WH3045>, and mine acquaintance into darkness <WH4285>.
